original: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: and do not attain individual enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes /
translated: it is because they know that all phenomena are empty of their own marks,

original: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par shes te /
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / mngon par ma grub par shes te /
translated: and they know that all phenomena are nonexistent, non-arisen, non-ceased, and non-afflicted.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Practicing those dharmas that are the factors for awakening, they transcend the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ste /
translated: and the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ receptivity to the nonproduction of dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad @221b la snyoms par 'jug /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad @221b la snyoms par 'jug /
translated: are absorbed in the eight deliverances

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
translated: and are absorbed in the nine serial absorptions,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed /
translated: they do not actualize the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par mi byed do //
translated: nor the fruit of once-returning, nor the fruit of non-returning, nor the fruit of arhatship, nor individual enlightenment.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so //🔽chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so // chos thams cad med pa dang / ma byung bar shes so //
translated: Because he knows that all dharmas are empty of own-marks,🔽that all dharmas are nonexistent and unarisen,

original: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so //
translated: that all dharmas are unproduced,

original: chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so //
translated: that all dharmas are unapprehendable.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, should become familiar with the ten powers of a Tathagata,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: with the four grounds of self-confidence, with the four analytical knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dris par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dris par byed /
translated: with the eighteen special Buddhadharmas,

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed kyang /🔽nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed kyang / nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du /
translated: and he should be familiar with great love and great compassion,🔽but he should not attain the knowledge of all aspects

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do //
translated: until the buddha-field is purified and until living beings are matured.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom like that.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who practice such deep dharmas

original: rnam @222a *// par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: rnam @222a *// par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni /
translated: without taking on the maturation

original: blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so //
analyzed: blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so //
translated: are endowed with the highest understanding.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Exactly so, Subhūti,

original: de de bzhin to /
analyzed: de de bzhin to /
translated: exactly so!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who practice such profound dharmas

original: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: and do not grasp at their ripening have the highest intelligence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings do not move from their intrinsic nature.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo ba lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: from what intrinsic nature do they not move?”

original: dngos po med pa las mi g-yo ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa las mi g-yo ba yin te /
translated: The Blessed One said, “They do not move from the absence of entities.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi g-yo zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Subhūti, when you ask, ‘From what intrinsic nature do they not move?’

original: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: they do not move from the intrinsic nature of form.

original: tshor ba dang; 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang; 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the intrinsic nature of the sense spheres, elements, or dependent origination.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essence of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essence of the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essence of inner emptiness, outer emptiness, or inner and outer emptiness.

original: dngos @222b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: dngos @222b po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essence of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from the essence of the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, or the four formless absorptions.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //🔽stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o // stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: They do not move from the essence of the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the noble eightfold path.🔽They do not move from the essence of the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, and the wishlessness meditative stabilization.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the essence of the eight deliverances, the nine serial meditative stabilizations,🔽and the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: and the nature of the Tathāgata’s powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, and distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: They do not move from the nature of great love and great compassion.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the nature of these dharmas is

original: dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ste /
translated: nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor / dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so //
translated: Subhūti, you cannot fully awaken to a nonexistent through a nonexistent.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ci lags / dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya @223a *//
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ci lags / dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya @223a *//
translated: “Well then, Blessed One,

original: bar bgyi bar nus sam /
analyzed: bar bgyi bar nus sam /
translated: can you fully awaken to a nonexistent through an existent?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“No, you cannot.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po ma mchis pas /
analyzed: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po ma mchis pas /
translated: “Well then, Blessed One,🔽can you fully awaken to an existent through a nonexistent?”

original: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
analyzed: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
translated: “Can a real thing be able to fully awaken to a real thing?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“No, Subhūti, it cannot.”

original: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po mchis pas /
analyzed: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po mchis pas /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
analyzed: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
translated: “Well then, can an unreal thing be able to fully awaken to an unreal thing?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
translated: “No, Subhūti, it cannot.”🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
analyzed: gsol pa / 'o na dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam /
translated: “Well then, can an unreal thing be able to fully awaken to a real thing?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni ma yin no //
translated: “No, Subhūti, it cannot.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: 'o na gal te de ltar dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur /🔽dngos po ma mchis pas kyang /
analyzed: 'o na gal te de ltar dngos po mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur / dngos po ma mchis pas kyang /
translated: “Well then, Blessed One, if a real thing cannot fully awaken to an unreal thing,

original: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: and an unreal thing cannot fully awaken to a real thing,

original: dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: “Lord, if a real thing does not realize a real thing, and an unreal thing does not realize an unreal thing,🔽Lord, will there not be no attainment and no clear realization?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,🔽will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,

original: mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'am gcig tu mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'am gcig tu mi 'gyur ram /
translated: will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,🔽will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: mngon @223b par rtogs pa ni yod med pa ma yin te /🔽bzhi pos mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon @223b par rtogs pa ni yod med pa ma yin te / bzhi pos mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no //
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,🔽will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,🔽will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,🔽will there not be no distinction between the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and the Great Vehicle?🔽” The Lord said, “Subhūti, there is no attainment and no clear realization.

original: gang la dngos po'ang med dngos po med pa'ang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la dngos po'ang med dngos po med pa'ang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: ” Subhūti said, “Lord, if there is no attainment and no clear realization,

original: de la spros pa de dag med pas /
analyzed: de la spros pa de dag med pas /
translated: will there not be

original: spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The absence of conceptual elaboration and freedom from conceptual elaboration are the realization.🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags /
translated: what is the conceptual elaboration of bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: The Lord said,

original: mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Śāriputra, saying ‘form is permanent’ or ‘form is impermanent’ is a bodhisattva great being’s conceptual elaboration.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: Saying ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are permanent’ or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are impermanent’ is a bodhisattva great being’s conceptual elaboration.

original: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: Saying ‘form is happiness’ or ‘form is suffering’ is a bodhisattva great being’s conceptual elaboration.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Saying ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are happiness’ or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are suffering’ is a bodhisattva great being’s conceptual elaboration.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o; ;gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o; ;gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is the conceptual elaboration of bodhisattva great beings.🔽 🔽Form is self or form is not self🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa @224a *//🔽bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa @224a *// bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings’ conceptualization of form as a self or not a self is a conceptualization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings’ conceptualization of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness as a self or not a self is a conceptualization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings’ conceptualization of form as peaceful or not peaceful is a conceptualization.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings’ conceptualization of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness as peaceful or not peaceful is a conceptualization.

original: gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings’ conceptualization of form as to be known or not to be known is a conceptualization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the elaboration of a bodhisattva mahāsattva.🔽Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are to be fully known or not to be fully known.🔽🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “ ‘The thorough cognition and non-thorough cognition of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness’ is a fabrication of bodhisattva great beings.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung brtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang; bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung brtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang; bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
translated: “ ‘The constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination are impermanent’ and ‘are permanent,’ ‘are suffering’ and ‘are happiness,’ ‘are self’ and ‘are not self,’

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‘are peaceful’ and ‘are not peaceful,’ and ‘are to be thoroughly cognized’ and ‘are not to be thoroughly cognized’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: is a fabrication of bodhisattva great beings.

original: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ ‘The truth of suffering is to be thoroughly cognized’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: are the elaborations of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: kun 'byung ba @224b spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang / lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba @224b spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang / lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The origin of suffering should be abandoned,” “Cessation should be manifested,” and “The path should be cultivated”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: are conceptual elaborations for bodhisattva great beings.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The six perfections should be practiced”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: is a conceptual elaboration for bodhisattva great beings.

original: nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The emptiness of internal phenomena should be cultivated”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: is a conceptual elaboration for bodhisattva great beings.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Up to “The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities should be cultivated”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: is a conceptual elaboration for bodhisattva great beings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “I should cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of awakening, and the eightfold noble path.”

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: “I should cultivate the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang; ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang; ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: signlessness, and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa @225a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa @225a *//
translated: are the elaborations of bodhisattva great beings.🔽The knowledge of the fruit of stream enterer,🔽

original: dang; mthong bas bltas te /
analyzed: dang; mthong bas bltas te /
translated: “ ‘The result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are seen by knowing and seeing.

original: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I will transcend that’—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: this is the elaboration of a bodhisattva great being.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas bltas te /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas bltas te /
translated: ‘The result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are seen by knowing and seeing.

original: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: I will transcend that’—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: this is the elaboration of a bodhisattva great being.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‘I will perfect the ten bodhisattva levels’—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: this is the elaboration of a bodhisattva great being.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‘I will enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva’—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: this is the elaboration of a bodhisattva great being.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: To purify a buddhafield and to bring living beings to maturity are the two kinds of work.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “I will purify a Buddha-field” and “I will bring beings to maturity” are conceptualizations for a Bodhisattva, a great being.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “I will generate the ten powers of the Tathāgata” and “I will generate the four fearlessnesses” and “I will generate the four detailed and thorough knowledges” and “I will generate great love and great compassion” and

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @225b nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @225b nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “I will generate the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha” are conceptualizations for a Bodhisattva, a great being.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: “I will attain the knowledge of all aspects” is a conceptualization for a Bodhisattva, a great being.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “I will abandon all the afflictions that are connected with residual impressions.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o //
translated: This is conceptual elaboration for a bodhisattva great being.

analyzed: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: they do not engage in conceptual elaboration, do not elaborate, about form as permanent or impermanent,

translated: about it as blissful or suffering, about it as self or not self, about it as peaceful or not peaceful, and about it as knowable or unknowable.

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: They do not engage in conceptual elaboration, do not elaborate, about feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as permanent or impermanent,🔽about them as blissful or suffering, about them as self or not self, about them as peaceful or not peaceful, and about them as knowable or unknowable.

original: dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag pa dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: dang; stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag pa dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /
translated: and all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, as permanent or impermanent, as ease or suffering, as self or not self,

original: zhi ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhi ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: as calm or not calm, or as something to be attained or not to be attained.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: He does not get involved with the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: “I will cultivate the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signlessness meditative stabilization, the wishlessness meditative stabilization, the five eyes, the six clairvoyances, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.”

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas bltas te /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub shes pa dang / mthong bas bltas te /
translated: “I will see the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and perfect complete enlightenment.”

original: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: “I will transcend that.”🔽“I will complete the ten bodhisattva stages.”

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //🔽byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //🔽byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: “I will enter into the secure stage of a bodhisattva.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su @226b smin par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su @226b smin par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not get excited or over-excited thinking, ‘I will bring beings to full maturity.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not get excited or over-excited thinking, ‘I will produce the ten powers of a Tathagata, the four grounds of self-confidence, and the four analytical knowledges.’

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not get excited or over-excited thinking, ‘I will produce the great friendliness, the great compassion, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddhas.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not get excited or over-excited thinking, ‘I will attain the knowledge of all modes.’

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not get excited or over-excited thinking, ‘I will abandon all the residues of the defilements.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid 'phro bar mi byed /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid 'phro bar mi byed /
translated: Subhūti, intrinsic nature does not emanate intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med pa 'phro bar mi byed /🔽ngo bo nyid dang dngos po med pa ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med pa 'phro bar mi byed / ngo bo nyid dang dngos po med pa ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa'am /
translated: A non-entity does not emanate a non-entity.🔽Apart from intrinsic nature and non-entity, there is no other phenomenon that emanates or

original: gang la 'phro bar bya ba de lta bu gang yang med de /
analyzed: gang la 'phro bar bya ba de lta bu gang yang med de /
translated: that emanates from anything.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na gzugs ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na gzugs ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, therefore, form is not emanated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o; ;skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o; ;skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not emanated. The constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination are not emanated.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni spror med pa'o //
translated: All the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not emanated.

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The result of stream enterer is not elaborated.🔽The result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, and the state of a worthy one are not elaborated.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o; ;rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o; ;rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The level of a pratyekabuddha is not elaborated.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva levels are not elaborated.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The maturity of a bodhisattva is not elaborated.🔽The maturity of a pratyekabuddha is not elaborated.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o //
translated: “Purifying a buddhafield and bringing beings to maturity is not something to be relished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not something to be relished.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not something to be relished.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Abandoning all the latent states of the afflictions is not something to be relished.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spror med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spror med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom that is not something to be relished in that way.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar yang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Subhūti, it is because form has no intrinsic nature.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness have no intrinsic nature.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid @227b med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid @227b med do //
translated: the sense fields, the components of perception, and dependent origination are essenceless.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: All the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven factors of awakening are essenceless.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: The noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: wishlessness, the superknowledges, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways are essenceless.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: The result of stream enterer is essenceless.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the result of being tied to one more rebirth, the result of no longer being subject to rebirth, and the result of arhatship have no intrinsic nature.

original: rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: solitary realizers have no intrinsic nature.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the bodhisattva stages have no intrinsic nature.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the bodhisattva faultlessness has no intrinsic nature.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: purifying a buddhafield and bringing sentient beings to full maturity have no intrinsic nature.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: the powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha have no intrinsic nature.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: omniscience has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni spror med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni spror med pa ste /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature cannot be elaborated.

original: rab 'byor / de'i phyir na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'i phyir na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, therefore, form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not elaborated.

original: skye mched dang / khams @228a *//
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams @228a *//
translated: The sense domains, elements,

original: dang; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: dang; rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o //
translated: and dependent origination are not elaborated.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni spror med pa'o //
translated: All perfections, all emptinesses, and the factors of awakening are not elaborated.🔽The noble truths, concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, liberations,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo ni spror med pa'o //
translated: wishlessness, superknowledges, meditative stabilizations, and dhāraṇī gateways are not elaborated.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The result of stream enterer is not elaborated.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
translated: the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and arhatship are not to be relished.

original: rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not to be relished.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva levels are not to be relished.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva faultlessness is not to be relished.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Purifying a buddhafield and bringing beings to maturity are not to be relished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni spror med pa'o //
translated: The powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are not to be relished.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o //
translated: Omniscience is not to be relished.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i @228b skyon med pa la 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i @228b skyon med pa la 'jug go /
translated: they enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar chos thams cad gang la'ang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar chos thams cad gang la'ang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na /
translated: if all phenomena are not apprehended as having any essence,🔽then by what path will bodhisattva great beings enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi shul tam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam / rang sangs rgyas kyi shul tam /
translated: the path of the śrāvakas,🔽the path of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam /
translated: or the path of the perfect Buddha?

original: chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: By what phenomenon will they enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings do not enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva by the path of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug /
translated: nor do they enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva by the path of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug gi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug gi /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings do not enter into the flawlessness of a bodhisattva by way of the path of a perfect buddha.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs shing /
translated: Subhūti, it is because bodhisattva great beings train in all paths

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: and enter into the flawlessness of a bodhisattva.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / brgyad pa ni chos thams cad la bslabs shing /
analyzed: dper na / brgyad pa ni chos thams cad la bslabs shing /
translated: for example, Subhūti, an eighth-level saint trains in all dharmas

original: yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /
translated: and enters into the flawlessness of the right path.

original: nam 'bras bu'i lam ma grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: nam 'bras bu'i lam ma grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do //
translated: Until he has established the path of fruition, he does not attain the fruition.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad la bsgrubs shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad la bsgrubs shing /
translated: “Subhūti, similarly, bodhisattva great beings train in all paths

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste /🔽nam rdo rje lta bu'i @229a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste / nam rdo rje lta bu'i @229a *//
translated: and enter into the flawlessness of a bodhisattva.🔽Until they have attained the vajropama samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur gyi bar du /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur gyi bar du /
translated: they do not attain the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do //🔽des ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do // des ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis /
translated: they will not attain the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: But when they have attained this concentration, then by the wisdom of one single moment they will attain the knowledge of all modes.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.

original: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi na /
translated: Subhuti: If, O Lord, the Bodhisattva, the great being, has fulfilled all the paths, and has entered on the certainty of a Bodhisattva,🔽then, O Lord, the Bodhisattva, the great being, has fulfilled the path of the Disciples and Pratyekabuddhas, and has entered on the certainty of a Bodhisattva.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan /🔽rgyun du bzhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan / rgyun du bzhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan / lan gcig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Subhuti, so it is.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan /🔽phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan / phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan /
translated: For the path of the Streamwinner is one,🔽the path of the Arhat is another,🔽the path of the Pratyekabuddha is another,

original: dgra bcom par zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dgra bcom par zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
translated: the path of the Bodhisattva is another,🔽the path of the Tathagata is another.

original: dgra bcom pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i shul kyang gzhan /
translated: The path of the arhat is one thing,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan /
translated: the path of the pratyekabuddha is another,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan te /
translated: and the path of the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas is another.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te shul de dag gzhan dang gzhan na /
analyzed: gal te shul de dag gzhan dang gzhan na /
translated: if those paths are different,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te /
translated: how will bodhisattva great beings complete all the paths

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: and enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: @229b gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi na /
analyzed: @229b gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi na /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings complete all the paths,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /
translated: will those bodhisattva great beings, having accomplished the path of the eighth,

original: brgyad par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: brgyad par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: not become an eighth?

original: mthong ba'i shul bsgrubs shing /
analyzed: mthong ba'i shul bsgrubs shing /
translated: Will they, having accomplished the path of seeing,

original: rgyun du zhugs par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: not become a stream enterer?

original: bsgom pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /
translated: Will they, having accomplished the path of meditation,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'am /
translated: “Will they enter the state of a once-returner,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram /
translated: or will they not become a once-returner?

original: phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'am /
translated: Will they enter the state of a non-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram /🔽dgra bcom par zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram / dgra bcom par zhugs pa'am /
translated: or will they not become a non-returner?🔽Will they enter the state of a worthy one,

original: dgra bcom par mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: dgra bcom par mi 'gyur ram /
translated: or will they not become a worthy one?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi shul bsgrubs shing /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi shul bsgrubs shing /
translated: Will they accomplish the path of a pratyekabuddha,

original: rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ram /
translated: or will they not become a pratyekabuddha?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par 'gyur nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par 'gyur nas /
translated: if a bodhisattva great being has become an eighth-level [bodhisattva],

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te /
translated: there is no opportunity or occasion for them to enter the faultless state of a bodhisattva,

original: de ni gnas ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma lags so //
translated: and that is not possible.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis /
translated: And without entering the faultless state of a bodhisattva, it is impossible for them to attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob nas /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob nas /
translated: the fruit of stream enterer, the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @230a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @230a *//
translated: there is no opportunity to enter into a bodhisattva’s faultlessness.

original: pa nyid thob par 'gyur pa'i gnas ma mchis na /
analyzed: pa nyid thob par 'gyur pa'i gnas ma mchis na /
translated: Without entering into a bodhisattva’s faultlessness, there is no opportunity to attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /
translated: in that way, after a bodhisattva great being has completed all the paths,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud nas /
translated: having entered into a bodhisattva’s faultlessness,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi /
translated: How should they understand the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects and the complete abandonment of all afflictions that are the connections of habitual tendencies?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti,🔽it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par 'gyur te /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings become eighth-level nonreturners,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'am /
translated: attain the fruit of nonreturner,🔽attain the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub thob par gyur nas /
analyzed: rang byang chub thob par gyur nas /
translated: or attain individual enlightenment,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs med de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs med de /
translated: but there is no opportunity for them to enter into the flawlessness of a bodhisattva.

original: de ni gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no //
translated: That is not possible.”

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do; ;rab 'byor /
translated: There is no chance that one who has not entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattva will attain the knowledge of all modes.

original: 'on kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽shes pa dang @230b mthong bas sa brgyad las yongs su 'da' ste /🔽brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe / shes pa dang @230b mthong bas sa brgyad las yongs su 'da' ste / brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: Subhuti : It is true, O Lord, that the Bodhisattva, the great being, from the first thought of enlightenment on, coursing in the perfection of giving, etc. to : in the perfection of wisdom, and in the means of unification, will transcend the eight stages, i.e.🔽the stage of bright insight, the stage of becoming, the eighth stage, the stage of vision, the stage of thinning, the stage of the want of复次，須菩提。 菩薩摩訶薩從初發意已來，行檀波羅蜜，行尸羅波羅蜜，行羼提波羅蜜，行毘梨耶波羅蜜，行禪波羅蜜，行般若波羅蜜，行方便力，過出聲聞、辟支佛地，入菩薩位。

original: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste /
analyzed: dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste /
translated: the stage of seeing what is positive, the stage of lineage, the eighth stage, the stage of seeing, the stage of thinning, the stage of freedom from desire, the stage of realizing what has been done, and the pratyekabuddha stage.🔽

original: sa bstan pa brgyad po 'di dag las shes pa dang mthong ba las 'das nas /
analyzed: sa bstan pa brgyad po 'di dag las shes pa dang mthong ba las 'das nas /
translated: Translation: There is no chance that one who has not entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattva will attain the knowledge of all modes.🔽Subhuti : It is true, O Lord, that the Bodhisattva, the great being, from the first thought of enlightenment on, coursing in the perfection of giving, etc. to : in the perfection of wisdom, and in the means of unification, will transcend the eight stages, i.e.🔽the stage of bright insight, the stage of becoming, the eighth stage, the stage of vision, the stage of thinning, the stage of the want of

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: Through the knowledge of the aspects of the path, they enter into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into the flawlessness of the bodhisattvas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
translated: through the knowledge of the aspects of the path, they abandon all the afflictions that are the connections of the latent tendencies.

original: rab 'byor / de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang /
translated: Subhūti, the knowledge of the eighth-lowest stage is also🔽the bodhisattva great beings’ patience.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang; spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang; spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang /
translated: The knowledge and abandonment of the stream enterer is also

translated: the bodhisattva great beings’ patience.🔽The knowledge and abandonment of the once-returner is also

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa /

analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa /

analyzed: chen po'i bzod pa chen po ste /
