original: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang; lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang; lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
translated: Should one not train in the characteristics of the noble truths of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path?

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
translated: Should one not train in the characteristics of dependent origination in forward and reverse order?

original: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
translated: Should one not train in the characteristics of the conditioned realm?

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am /
translated: Should one not train in the characteristics of the unconditioned realm?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na /
analyzed: gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na /
translated: if one should not train in the characteristics of these phenomena,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te /🔽nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur /
translated: how will bodhisattva great beings, having trained in the characteristics of all phenomena and the characteristics of conditioned things,🔽surpass the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas?

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na /
translated: If they do not surpass the levels of the hearers and solitary buddhas,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: How will they enter into the maturity of the bodhisattvas?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs na /
translated: If they do not enter into the maturity of the bodhisattvas,

original: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /
translated: how will they attain the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na /
translated: If they do not attain the knowledge of all aspects,

original: @238a *// ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi /
analyzed: @238a *// ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi /
translated: how will they turn the wheel of the Dharma?

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na /🔽ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na / ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: If they do not turn the wheel of the Dharma,🔽how will they liberate beings from saṃsāra by means of the Vehicle of the Hearers,

original: theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar bgyi /
analyzed: theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar bgyi /
translated: or by means of the Vehicle of the Solitary Buddhas,🔽or by means of the Great Vehicle?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni /
translated: “Su­bhūti, if any phenomena had defining characteristics,

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na /
translated: then great bodhisattva beings would train in those defining characteristics.

original: chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing /
translated: However, all phenomena are without defining characteristics,

original: gzugs med / bstan du med /
analyzed: gzugs med / bstan du med /
translated: are formless, and are not demonstrable.

original: thogs pa med pa ste; 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ste; 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: because it is without defining characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pas na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pas na /
translated: and because it is a single defining characteristic.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should not train in defining characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med pa la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: and they should not train in the absence of defining characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sngon chad mtshan nyid med par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / sngon chad mtshan nyid med par gyur pa'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is not that they were previously without defining characteristics

original: phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: and later came to have defining characteristics.

original: rab 'byor / chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang mtshan nyid med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang mtshan nyid med la /
translated: Subhūti, these phenomena have been without defining characteristics from the beginning,

original: da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na /
analyzed: da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na /
translated: and they are without defining characteristics now.

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should not train in defining characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med pa la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa la'ang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: and they should not train in the absence of defining characteristics.

original: de ci'i phyir zhen /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhen / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
translated: Why is that?🔽Whether the tathāgatas appear

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: or whether the tathāgatas do not appear,

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings @238b 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings @238b 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the realm without characteristics, and it is thus.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Blessed One,

original: gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing /
analyzed: gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing /
translated: if all phenomena are without characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags /
translated: if they are not different characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na /
translated: and if they are not the same characteristic,

original: de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa mchis par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa mchis par 'gyur /
translated: how can the bodhisattva great beings’ cultivation of the perfection of wisdom come to be?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: without the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom,🔽the bodhisattva great beings cannot transcend the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus so //🔽nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus so // nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽Without transcending the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings cannot enter into the bodhisattvas’ faultless state.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni /
translated: Without having entered into the bodhisattvas’ faultlessness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so //
translated: a bodhisattva-mahāsattva is not able to generate the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: Without having generated the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, he is not able to accomplish the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni /
translated: Without having accomplished the bodhisattvas’ superknowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so //
translated: he is not able to purify a buddhafield and bring beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni /
translated: Without having purified a buddhafield and brought beings to maturity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so //🔽rnam pa @239a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so // rnam pa @239a *//
translated: he is not able to attain the knowledge of all aspects.🔽Without having attained the knowledge of all aspects,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so //
translated: he is not able to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: Without turning the wheel of the Dharma, it is not possible to establish sentient beings in the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: It is not possible to establish them in the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, in the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, or in arhatship.

original: rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: It is not possible to establish them in individual enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: It is not possible to establish them in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: It is not possible to establish sentient beings in the meritorious action of giving.

original: tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi pa'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi pa'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so //
translated: It is not possible to establish them in the meritorious action of morality, or in the meritorious action of meditation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are without a defining mark.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Nor are they different characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: Nor are they the same characteristic.

original: gsol pa / de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na /
analyzed: gsol pa / de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “If all phenomena are without characteristics,

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur /
translated: how can the perfection of wisdom be cultivated?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin /
translated: the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom by bodhisattva great beings is neither different characteristics

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin @239b te; rab 'byor /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin @239b te; rab 'byor /
translated: nor the same characteristic.

original: mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the cultivation of the absence of characteristics is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom by bodhisattva great beings.”

original: gsol pa / de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur /
analyzed: gsol pa / de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur /
translated: Śāriputra then asked, “How is the cultivation of the absence of characteristics the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Śāriputra,

original: chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of all dharmas is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽Subhūti said:

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: how is the cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of all dharmas the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of form is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of the eyes is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the discrimination of form is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The cultivation of the cultivation of the discrimination of sound,

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: smell, taste, feeling, and dharmas is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / @240a *//
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / @240a *//
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the discrimination of eye-consciousness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The cultivation of the cultivation of the discrimination of ear-consciousness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: nose-consciousness, tongue-consciousness, body-consciousness, and mind-consciousness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the discrimination of eye-contact is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on the union of the eye is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.🔽The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on the feeling which results from the union of the eye is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on the feeling which results from the union of the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, and the mind is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the earth element is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chu'i khams dang; me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang; me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: @240b rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: @240b rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of dependent origination is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of ignorance is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the conditioning forces, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the acceptance is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the rejection is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the first concentration is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the second, third, and fourth concentrations is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on love is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on compassion, on joy, and on equanimity is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //🔽rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes @241a *//
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes @241a *//
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on the station of endless space is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the meditation on the station of endless consciousness, on the station of nothingness, and on the station of neither perception nor non-perception is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the recollection of the Buddha is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Saṅgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of renunciation, the recollection of the gods, the recollection of dissatisfaction, the recollection of in-and-out breathing,

original: 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: the recollection of death, and the cultivation of the recollection of the aspects of the body is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the perception of impermanence is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang /
translated: “The cultivation of the perception of suffering, the perception of selflessness, the perception of the unattractive, the perception of the insubstantial, the perception of the self, the perception of sentient beings, the perception of life, the perception of birth,

original: gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /
translated: the perception of a person, the perception of an individual, the perception of a human being, the perception of a human, the perception of an agent, the perception of a feeler, the perception of a knower,

original: mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @241b pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @241b pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: and the perception of a seer—the cultivation of the perception of these is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: “The cultivation of the perception of permanence is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the notion of pleasure, the notion of the agreeable, and the notion of self is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the applications of mindfulness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the path is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the concentration with applied thought and sustained thought, and the concentration without applied thought but with sustained thought, and the concentration without applied thought and without sustained thought, is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the noble truth of suffering is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni @242a *//
analyzed: kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni @242a *//
translated: The cultivation of the meditation on the noble truth of the arising of suffering, and the noble truth of the cessation of suffering, and the noble truth of the path,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering, and the knowledge of the path is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the knowledge of destruction is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the knowledge of non-arising, the knowledge of dharmas, the knowledge of subsequent attainment, the knowledge of convention, the knowledge of fluency, and the knowledge in accordance with sound is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of generosity is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of vigor, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of internal phenomena is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the six superknowledges is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad @242b rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad @242b rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of all meditative concentrations is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of all dhāraṇī gateways is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of great love and great compassion is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of the cultivation of the result of stream enterer is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and arhatship,

original: rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: the fruit of individual enlightenment,🔽up to the knowledge of all modes,

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: the forsaking of all the residues of the defilements,

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: Subhuti:

original: ji ltar @243a *//
analyzed: ji ltar @243a *//
translated: How, O Lord, is the perfection of wisdom cultivated as the cultivation of the full attention on form, etc.🔽How is the perfection of wisdom cultivated as the cultivation of the full attention on the knowledge of all modes?

original: na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the discernment of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the discernment of the sense domains, constituents, and dependent origination the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na blang ba dang / dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na blang ba dang / dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the discernment of adopting and discarding the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: How is the cultivation of the first concentration, the second concentration, the third concentration, the fourth concentration, love, compassion, joy, equanimity, the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: the meditative cultivation of the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the meditative cultivation of the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothingness, and the meditative cultivation of the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception is the meditative cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang /
translated: How is the meditative cultivation of the meditative cultivation of the recollection of the Buddha, the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Saṅgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of giving, the recollection of the gods,

original: skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / @243b lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / @243b lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: the recollection of misery, the recollection of inhalation and exhalation, the recollection of death, and the recollection of the body the meditative cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
translated: How do they cultivate the meditation of the perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering, the perception of no self, the perception of repulsiveness, the perception of non-entityness, the perception of self, the perception of sentient beings,

original: srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /
translated: the perception of life force, the perception of birth, the perception of nourishment, the perception of a person, the perception of an individual, the perception of one who has power over himself, the perception of an agent,

original: tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: the perception of a feeler, the perception of a knower, and the perception of a seer?

original: ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the perception of permanence, the perception of happiness, the perception of purity, and the perception of self the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the factors of awakening the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?🔽How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, the wishless meditative stabilization, the eight deliverances, and the nine serial absorptions the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /🔽ji ltar na @244a *//
analyzed: ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /🔽ji ltar na @244a *//
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the ten tathāgata powers…🔽the four fearlessnesses…🔽the four detailed and thorough knowledges…🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha…

original: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: It is the cultivation of the concentration that is accompanied by thought and discernment, the concentration that is without thought but accompanied by discernment, and the concentration that is without either thought or discernment.🔽How does one cultivate the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
translated: How does one cultivate the noble truths of suffering, of the origin of suffering, of the cessation of suffering, and of the path to the cessation of suffering? How does one cultivate the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering, and the knowledge of the path to the cessation of suffering?

original: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: the knowledge of the path, the knowledge of extinction, the knowledge of non-production, the knowledge of phenomena, the knowledge of subsequent realization, the conventional knowledge, the knowledge of the learned, and the knowledge of the way things are, is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: How is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom the cultivation of all the perfections and all the emptinesses?

original: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: How is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom the cultivation of the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @244b bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @244b bsgom pa lags /
translated: the cultivation of the cultivation of great love and great compassion is the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /
translated: How is the cultivation of the cultivation of the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and the knowledge of all aspects, up to

original: ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags /
translated: how is the cultivation of the cultivation of the abandonment of all afflictions together with their traces the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: they do not cultivate ‘form is existent,’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are existent things.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that the sense fields, elements, and dependent originations are existent things.

original: blang ba dang / dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: blang ba dang / dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that taking up and laying down are existent things.

original: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that the first concentration, the second concentration, the third concentration, the fourth concentration, love, compassion, joy, equanimity, the sphere of endless space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod @245a *//
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod @245a *//
translated: the sphere of endless consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception are existent things.

original: ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: Do not meditate on that.🔽

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /
translated: One should not cultivate the recollection of the Buddha, the recollection of the Dharma, the recollection of the Saṅgha, the recollection of morality, the recollection of generosity, the recollection of the gods, the recollection of tranquility,

original: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: the recollection of breathing, the recollection of death, the recollection of the body, or the recollection of forms as entities.

original: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang /
translated: One should not cultivate the perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering, the perception of non-self, the perception of the unattractive, the perception of non-entity, the perception of self, the perception of sentient beings,

original: srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /
analyzed: srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /
translated: He should not cultivate the notion that the individual is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the personality is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the one who knows and the one who sees is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the eye is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thought are things.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that form is a thing.

original: tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He should not cultivate the notion that sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects are things.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the earth element is a thing.

original: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He should not cultivate the notion that the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are things.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the eye faculty is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thought faculties are things.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the male faculty is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the female faculty is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the vitality faculty is a thing.🔽He should not cultivate the notion that the sensation faculty is a thing.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He should not cultivate the notion that the spiritual faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and limbs of the path are things.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / @245b rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / @245b rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that the emptiness concentration, the signless concentration, the wishless concentration, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions,🔽the concentration on the void, the concentration on the signless, the concentration on the wishless, the concentration of the sphere of endless space, the concentration of the sphere of endless consciousness, the concentration of the sphere of nothingness, the concentration of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, the concentration of cessation, and the concentration with conception and without conception are real.

original: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod ba dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod ba dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo //
translated: He does not cultivate the notion that the concentration with conception and without conception is real.🔽He does not cultivate the notion that the noble truths of suffering, of the origin of suffering, of the cessation of suffering, and of the path leading to the cessation of suffering are real.

original: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /

translated: He does not cultivate the notion that the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of the origin of suffering, the knowledge of the cessation of suffering, and the knowledge of the path leading to the cessation of suffering are real.
